TopicTitle: Suggestion to include achievements and missions in the game!

Articles.Content:
Hi there, so I was looking at some of the mods that work on 0.23 and found this one called "achievements", which I think its great.

So I was wondering if this could be a suggestion for the DEVs to include something like missions and/or achievements in the game which you would need to complete in order to perhaps unlock more parts (from other addons maybe)?

I trully believe that having things to do, an objective, would give us a new perspective and motivation in the game.

Theres close to unlimited possibilities and achievements and or missions as we can see in these forums people are trying to do.

Why not inlcude them or the best ones in the game? Maybe also create an achievements records and an online profile where we could check on each other, etc..

Thanks.

there is already achievements in the game...ish you can see what has been achieved in a particular save in the persist file it can be interesting to look at. tho there is no way (without mods) to see it in game
According to one of the Devs that's coming in the next version in the form of randomly generated mission contracts from sets of basic parameters
